field.value: Cannot specify a default value for ViewComponentParameterAttribute

field.name: description
field.value:
When using ViewComponentParameterAttribute there is no way to specify a default value for the parameter. Normally, this is handled by initializing the property's underlying field. However, when using the the C# 3.0 property syntax (where the underlying field is unavailable) this is not an option. Also, this separates the default value from the property itself.
A better way is to have a Default property on the ViewComponentParameterAttribute. The attached path implements this.
Note the patch also moves the code to handle SupportsSection into the ViewComponentDetailsAttribute
